Topic.Title: Use Blank Space on sides of Gamebook text

Posts.EditableText: [img:3e4w4cpp]http://i.imgur.com/mUPvZlQ.jpg[/img:3e4w4cpp] What I would like to do is utilize the sides of my Gamebook's text to show character artwork. As you can see in the picture above, the spaces tend to get a little big. My reasoning is that I want to display who is present in the scene without it intruding in the text itself - the scenes are already long enough without the artwork stretching the page! Is there a reasonable way to do this?
